physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. A lady dressed in an ethnic Chinese costume is featured in the photograph. She is posing sideways but her head is tilted towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. She is holding a hand fan on her left hand. She adorns earrings and has ornaments and flowers on her head.
